question: The Marathi language became compulsory across all schools in the academic year 2020-2021 in Maharashtra up to which class?
explanation: As per the Maharashtra Compulsory Teaching and Learning of Marathi Language in Schools Bill 2020, the Marathi language became compulsory across all schools in the academic year 2020-2021 in Maharashtra from Class I to Class X. a penalty amount of Rs. 1 lakh was declared to be levied for not implementing the rule.
